`R` notes.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `jeksterslabRnotes` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRnotes) with:

```r
remotes::install_github("jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRnotes")
```

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslabds.github.io/jeksterslabRnotes/index.html)
for package documentation.
